about_the_game:
Unleash Cosmic Chaos!

With over 100 million players unleashing planetary destruction in the original Solar Smash, the chaos reaches new heights with Solar Smash: Annihilation. This sequel introduces multiplayer mayhem, powerful new upgrades, Steam Workshop support, and stunningly enhanced graphics for an unmatched experience of cosmic destruction.

Dive in, obliterate worlds, create chaos, and explore endless new possibilities.

Next-Level Destruction

Prepare to annihilate planets and moons in incredible detail.

  • 1 Million Voxels Per Planet. From cosmic dust to planetary rings, every element comes to life with each interaction.

  • Dynamic Planetary Rings. 150,000 particles that will respond to your every attack.

  • Regional Population Tracking. See your destruction unfold and witness the impact of your actions as real-time stats reveal the scale of devastation on the planet's population.

Multiplayer Madness

Take destruction to the next level TOGETHER.

  • Co-Op Mode. Team up with friends to obliterate entire solar systems.

  • Versus Multiplayer. Crush the competition and claim victory.

  • Steam Workshop Integration. Share and play custom planets with ease.

Wishlist now! 🙂
